headline.print_headline: Officer Shoots Man Outside Dallas Love Field Airport
headline.main: Officer Shoots Man Outside Dallas Love Field Airport

snippet: An official said the officer fired several times when a man believed to be involved in a domestic dispute rushed at him with a rock. The man’s condition was unknown.
lead_paragraph: An official said the officer fired several times when a man believed to be involved in a domestic dispute rushed at him with a rock. The man’s condition was unknown.
